name: Floverview
description:
A flexible yet easy to use toolkit for creating hybrid user flows and content maps.


Floverview can be used for various needs such as high-level wireframing, or designing and communicating to your team information architecture or particular user scenarios.


It comes with these parts:


  • Pages which are containers for content blocks and function buttons
  • Content blocks for showing what the page contain. There are 16 types of content block for items such as text areas, forms, charts and tables
  • Function buttons for showing what users can do on a page. These functions are typically used with Connectors
  • Connectors for joining functions to other pages
  • Comment bubbles for annotating pages and flows
  • Group frames for grouping flows


Naturally, everything is auto layout for ease of use. Enjoy!
